title: Vyperchain
author: Vyperchain
content: VYPERCHAINVyperchain is a Scalable, Sustainable, High-performance Layer-1 Blockchain Platform focused on DeFi, GameFi and Metaverse. It is fully compatible to EVM enabling developers to build scalable user-friendly dApps at nearly zero cost.DISCOVER VYPERCHAINEVM CompatibilityPopular Ethereum tooling and full support for solidity and vyper makes it easy to port dApps over.Cross-chain SupportConnected to popular public chains with Vyper Bridge, enables cross-chain data and token transfers.High PerformanceHandles 2,000+ tx per block on open network while maintaining security and scalability.Zero FeesDesigned in such way that the transaction fee remains nearly 0 (currently 0.0000001$) forever.TOKENOMICSName: VyperTicker: VPRChainID: 50505Max Supply: 1,000,000,000 VPRPresale: 300,000,000 (30%)Liquidity: 100,000,000 (10%)Staking / Farming: 400,000,000 (40%)Developer Grants: 50,000,000 (5%)Development: 100,000,000 (10%)Team: 50,000,000 (5%)OFFICIAL LINKSWebsite: https://vyperchain.org/Telegram Ann: https://t.me/VyperchainTelegram Chat: https://t.me/Vyperchain_ChatTwitter: https://twitter.com/VyperchainDocs: SoonWhitepaper: SoonRPC Endpoint: Soon
